metadata.title: Consistency Modes
metadata.description: Every Consul HTTP API read request uses one of several "consistency modes" that offer different levels of response consistency and performance. By default, Consul uses a consistency mode that is suitable for most use cases. Users can override consistency modes to fine-tune these trade-offs for their own use case.
